frontendText: We develop responsive, high-performance interfaces using HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and React. Our approach ensures fast loading, smooth animations, and compatibility across devices and browsers. We can also deliver sites on WordPress.
backendText: We develop secure and scalable backends using Node.js, PHP, Laravel, and MySQL. Whether it's handling user authentication, databases, or custom APIs — we ensure the system runs reliably. Integrations with CMS or custom admin panels are also available.
uiuxText: We design modern and user-friendly interfaces in Figma and Adobe XD, paying special attention to user flows, accessibility, and visual consistency. Whether it’s a landing page or a full product UI — we create experiences that convert.

1.title: Project Discussion
1.text: We carefully listen to your ideas and requirements to craft the perfect project.

2.title: Design & Prototyping
2.text: We create unique layouts and prototypes to make sure we’re heading in the right direction.

3.title: Development
3.text: We dive into the code to build a functional and visually appealing website.

4.title: Testing & Launch
4.text: We run final checks to ensure everything works flawlessly before launching the project.

5.title: Support & Optimization
5.text: We continue working with you to keep your site up-to-date and performing smoothly.

header.subtitle: the creators of digital excellence. From concept to code, we design and develop websites that make a difference.

1.question: How long does it take to build a website?
1.answer: Usually from 7 to 15 days, depending on the complexity of the project and the developed design/model.

2.question: Is there any support for the site after its development?”
2.answer: Yes, the first month is free, then 50-60 dollars

3.question: What other services do you offer besides website development?
3.answer: After developing the site, you need to promote it to attract customers, we have partners who will help with this. We also offer editing services, video shooting, and more.

4.question: Do you help with hosting and domain?
4.answer: Yes, we will advise and help you with the choice of hosting and domain. Or, if necessary, we can do everything ourselves

5.question: How can I contact you?
5.answer: You can write to us on Telegram, Instagram or via the website form.

whyChooseUs.title: Why choose us?
whyChooseUs.subtitle: More than just a team — your reliable digital partner.

reasons.title: Modern design
reasons.text: We create stylish, trendy interfaces tailored to your audience.

reasons.title: Full development cycle
reasons.text: From idea to launch — we take care of everything.

reasons.title: Speed & quality
reasons.text: Timely delivery without compromising on quality.

1.title: Custom Approach
1.text: We tailor every project to your specific business goals.

3.title: Business-Driven Design
3.text: Our design helps you convert visitors into customers.

4.title: Long-Term Partnership
4.text: We care about your growth and stay with you long after launch.

form.title: Let’s discuss your project
form.subtitle: Fill out the form and we’ll get in touch shortly
form.name: Name
form.siteTypeTitle: What type of site do you need?
form.success: Thanks! Your message has been sent. Please wait for a reply.

tesla.description: Landing for Tesla with adaptation and smooth animation. The project demonstrates the ability to work with the layout and adapt it for different devices.

appleHeadphones.description: A concept for Apple headphone branding lendings. Clean structure, nice animation and emphasis on visual style.

scrollAnimation.description: A project with scroll animations using GSAP for smooth transitions. This project will demonstrate the use of animations to improve the user experience.

mercedesConcept.description: Concept landing for new Mercedes AVTR.

fairyParallax.description: A magical scrolling experience using 3D parallax with ScrollTrigger and GSAP. Illustrates animation control based on scroll position.

priceCards.description: Responsive price card layouts with clean design and SCSS structure. Demonstrates flexbox usage and component-based SCSS.

crappo.description: Crypto landing page concept with animations and stylish layout. Focus on structured content and modern UI presentation.

rentiz.description: A modern real estate landing with dynamic blocks, smooth animations, and responsive layout using SCSS and Flex/Grid.

beanAndLeaf.description: A coffee shop concept website with a strong visual layout and custom image slider. Fully responsive and animation-ready.

beautyByMariia.description: A real commercial website for a beauty master. Built on WordPress and code, with custom styling and responsive layout. SEO-ready and client-managed.

watches.description: A concept e-commerce website for a luxury watch brand

TAR.description: A full-scale commercial website for a German heat metering company.Built from scratch using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. Fully responsive with a modern layout and custom design.Currently in development, but already available for preview.
